name: Leopard Gecko Simulator
description:
LeopardGeckoSimulator.

Hatch your own virtual leopard gecko and raise him up to become a strong adult !

The goal of the game is to grow your gecko as large as posible !

Developed by : TvmApps (&THOMAAASMIX Productions 2016) !

Download the beta version now on itch.io/thomaaasmix !

for only 0.49$ ! once the app gets uploaded to the android appstore

(December 25-2016) the price will be 0.99$ !

To download :

*Pay the minimum of 0.50$ (more is optional to help the developer make new apps).

*Download the .zip file on your windows computer.

*Open the .zip file and extract the .apk file to your desktop.

*Connect your Android smarthphone to your pc either via usb or bleuthooth.

*copy and paste the .apk file to your Android phone ( it will be copied to the storage map on your device).

* Disconnect your cellphone from your pc.

* Go on your phone to your saved ( or downloaded ) files map and search for the LeopardGeckoSimulator.apk file.

* Dubble click on it to install the game !

* AND ENJOY :)

LeopardGeckoSimulator (C) TvmApps / THOMAAASMIX Productions 2016.

For more information contact : tvmapps@gmail.com or thomaaasmix@gmail.com
